name: Webbersai Product Content Generator For Woocommerce
author: WebbersAI

sections.description:
Webbersai Product Content Generator For Woocommerce is a plugin that automatically generates content, product images, meta tags, and description for your products using AI technology. This helps you to quickly and easily create SEO-friendly content for your product pages.

Features

  • Generate product descriptions and short descriptions.

  • Generate SEO meta tags and meta descriptions.

  • Generate product tags.

  • Generate product images.

  • Works seamlessly with TinyMCE editor.

  • Easy to use and configure.

Admin Settings Configure

  1. Select Type of AI.

  2. Add your API key.

  3. Add your Organisation model for OpenAI.

  4. Select your AI model.

  5. Select your content language.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See the LICENSE file for more details.

Third-Party Services

This plugin relies on the OpenAI API to generate product content, images, tags, meta tags, and meta descriptions. When you use this plugin, data will be sent to OpenAI’s servers for processing and the results will be returned to your website.

The plugin interacts with the following OpenAI endpoints:

  • https://api.openai.com/v1/images/generations

By using this plugin, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth by OpenAI. Please review their terms of service and privacy policy to ensure compliance.

For more information about OpenAI, please visit their official website: OpenAI

Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

  • OpenAI Terms of Service

  • OpenAI Privacy Policy

Domains Used

The plugin communicates with the following domain:

  • https://api.openai.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

  3. Navigate to the product edit screen to start generating content.
sections.faq:
How do I generate content for my products?

Navigate to the product edit screen, enter the product title, and click the “Generate Product Description” button. It will automatically generate product description, short description, and tags. Then click the “Generate Meta Tags” button. It will automatically generate meta tags and description for your product.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3 : The plugin now incorporates image generation through OpenAI.

1.0.2 : Incorporated OpenAI’s response to generate content.

1.0.1 : Ensure that the meta data is added.

1.0.0 : Generate initial publication.

short_description: This plugin generates product content, product images, product tags, meta tags and meta description for WooCommerce products using AI.
